column2: If §Y[This.GetTitledName]§! is our prisoner or we control their capital, then we will take over their empire. If not we will subjugate all occupied provinces.\n§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! will usurp §YCounties§! until [Root.GetHerHis] §YDemesne Limit§! is reached!\n
All §YCounties§! owned directly by [From.GetTitledFirstName] will be trasnfered to [Root.GetTitledFirstName].
Claimant can use this casus beli to conquer a duchy inside China region.
